 module B(
   input wire [7:0] x,
   input wire [7:0] y,
   output wire [7:0] out
 );
+  wire [7:0] and_3;
+  wire [7:0] add_8;
   wire [7:0] add_5;
-  assign add_5 = (x & x) + (y | y);
-  assign out = add_5;
+  assign and_3 = x & x;
+  assign add_8 = and_3 + 8'h00;
+  assign add_5 = and_3 + (y | y);
+  assign out = add_8;
 endmodule
